heading: About the Project
intro: A comprehensive, open-source catalog of freshwater aquarium fish â€” built by aquarists, for aquarists.
feature_catalog_desc: Detailed profiles covering characteristics, feeding, care, breeding, and useful tips for each freshwater aquarium fish species.
feature_opensource_desc: Built on open-source principles using Markdown format. All content is stored in a public GitHub repository anyone can contribute to.
feature_community_desc: Created by passionate aquarists who continuously research and add new data, ensuring the catalog remains a valuable resource for all levels.
